did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Typewritten manuscripts, Pedigree charts of Kiehl/Grinnell and related families of Onondaga County, N.Y., and ancestors and descendants of Orlando Grinnell (1845-1920) and Jennie Churchill of Spafford, Onondaga County, N.Y.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Two typewritten manuscripts, Pedigree charts of Kiehl/Grinnell and related families of Onondaga County, N.Y. (July 1959), and Some ancestors and descendants of Orlando Grinnell (1845-1920) and Jennie Churchill of Spafford, Onondaga County, N.Y. (July 1979); and three typewritten updates to Some ancestors and descendants ... (December 1979, March 1986, and December 1986), consisting of corrections and additions. Related families include the Churchills and Babcocks.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Ralph A. Kiehl, compiler. Grinnell and Kiehl family genealogies, #2053. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: All the material in the collection may not be covered by this guide.
